Name: tha-groupfromthesoc-la
Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

Translations.Text: læa sing dı thi phwk cea di rab nan man pen pheiyng paccay hæng chiwit khxng lok ni læa pen kheruxngpradab khxng man tæ thi xallxhˌ nan di kwa læa cirang kwa phwk cea mi chı payya khırkhrwy dxk hrux

dangnan phu dı thi rea di hı sayya kæ khea sung pen sayya xan di ngam khea k ca pen phu phb man ca hemuxnkab phu thi rea di hı paccay kæ khea sung paccay hæng chiwit khxng lok ni læw nı wan ki ya mahˌ khea ca pen phu hnung nı hmu phu thuk na ma xyu txhna kranan hrux
læa (cng raluk thung) wan thi phraxngkh thrng reiyk phwk khea læw tras wa hin lea hela phakhi khxng kha thi phwk cea klaw xang

Brrda phu thi phra daras khukhwr kæ phwk khea klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng rea hela ni khux brrda phu thi rea thahı hlng phid rea di thahı phwk khea hlng phid chen deiyw kab thi rea di hlng phid xeng rea khx pliktaw xxk dæ phraxngkh læa phwk khea midi khearph phakdi tx rea cring «dxk

læa ca miseiyng klaw wa cng reiyk rxng phakhi khxng phwk cea phwk khea k rxng reiyk phwk man tæ phwk man mi kha rab phwk khea læa meux phwk khea di hen kar lngthosʹ phwk khea k khad hwang wa hak phwk khea di xyu nı næwthang thi thuk txng
læa wan thi phraxngkh thrng reiyk phwk khea læw tras wa phwk cea totxb kæ brrda rx su l wa xyangri
dangnan khx kætaw di thahı phwk khea mudmn nı wan nan chanan phwk khea cung mi titham sung kanlæakan
swn phu lukæthosʹ læa sraththa læa prakxb khwam di bangthi khea ca xyu nı hmu phu brrlu khwam sarec

læa phracea khxng cea thrng srang sing thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa thrng leuxk sahrab phwk khea mimi siththi nı kar leuxk mha brisuththi ying dæ xallxhˌ læa phraxngkh thrng sungsng cak sing thi phwk khea tang phakhi
læa phracea khxng cea nan thrng rxbru sing thi hawxk khxng phwk khea pkpid xyu læa sing thi phwk khea peidphey

læa phra xngkh khux xallxhˌ mimi phracea xun dı(thi thuk krab hiw doy theiyngthæ) nxkcak phraxngkh sahrab phraxngkh theanan brrda kar srrseriy nı lok hna læa kar chikhad nan pen siththi khxng phraxngkh theanan læa yang phraxngkh theanan phwk cea ca thuk na klab
